[Engine] Stabilization : performances improved
Alert processing

History data storage

[GUI] Possibility to add and delete a server

Alpha
05/10/2012
[Engine] Bugfix : SMS were not always sent
[GUI] Bugfix : sometimes it was impossible to add an alert
[GUI] Bugfix : Random display problems (??label??)
25/09/2012
[Engine] Alert calculation process bugfixes
[GUI] Interface stabilization
[GUI] Feedbacks during alert creation
[GUI] Alert set in the gui displayed ("Alert list" tab, to be refreshed manually)
[GUI] Sent alert history (Monitoring link, top right of the screen)
[GUI / Engine] SMS Quota (not visible, set to zero by default, recharged on demand)
12/09/2012
Create an account (but it seems to be done)
Order you first probe
Define your alert medias (cell phones, mail addresses)
Define and activate your alerts about :
Memory usage (KB)
Load average
This product evolves almost every day.
We will keep you informed about the new features through this page.
